column5: A new study is underway that will result in clearer understanding of the movement patterns of walleye through the Huron-Erie corridor. There are now walleye in the system that sport reward tags. The tags are spaghetti-type tags, not the standard metal jaw tags. See the image of the poster below for more details. These posters will be showing up at bait shops and launch sites along Lake Erie, the Detroit River, Lake St. Clair, the St. Clair River, and Lake Huron. - Mike Thomas, Fisheries Research Biologist, MDNR Lake St. Clair Fisheries Research Station, [emailÂ protected]

wow thats great news...tracking the movements and cycles of the walleyes..!!! and a nice chunk o change for returning the tag,and you get to keep the fish too...hope the data collected gives them lots of info
That should busy up the area a little.
sweet thats right in my backyard. too bad were still iced in now
